Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a male aged 28 yrs presents with mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous. pt also reports of mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 92.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

td.content: s:patient presents with 12 days history of worsening mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous and mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech. he is a 29 YO white male. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 93.5 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.
